languages.text: {n}О таком демоне вы не слышали. Зато помните из отчетов, что бригадира пятого пищевого депо, скрягу и садиста, зовут Малакай Дрек.{/n}
{n}You do not remember hearing of such a daemon before. What you do remember from reports is that the name of the foreman of the 5th food depot, a known miser and sadist, is Malakai Drek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}О таком демоне вы не слышали. Зато помните из отчетов, что бригадира пятого пищевого депо, скрягу и садиста, зовут Малакай Дрек.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ne vous rappelez pas avoir entendu parler d'un tel démon. En revanche, vous vous souvenez d'avoir lu le nom de Malakaï Ter dans des rapports. C'est celui du contremaître du cinquième dépôt de vivres, un avare doublé d'un sadique notoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not remember hearing of such a daemon before. What you do remember from reports is that the name of the foreman of the 5th food depot, a known miser and sadist, is Malakai Drek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne vous rappelez pas avoir entendu parler d'un tel démon. En revanche, vous vous souvenez d'avoir lu le nom de Malakaï Ter dans des rapports. C'est celui du contremaître du cinquième dépôt de vivres, un avare doublé d'un sadique notoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No has oído el nombre de ese demonio, pero sí sabes que el capataz del quinto depósito de comida, conocido por su racanería y sadismo, es Malakai Drek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not remember hearing of such a daemon before. What you do remember from reports is that the name of the foreman of the 5th food depot, a known miser and sadist, is Malakai Drek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No has oído el nombre de ese demonio, pero sí sabes que el capataz del quinto depósito de comida, conocido por su racanería y sadismo, es Malakai Drek.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你从来没听说哪个恶魔叫这个名字，不过你记得之前看过船上的任务报告。五号粮库的领班叫马莱凯·德雷克，是个众所周知的吝啬鬼、虐待狂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not remember hearing of such a daemon before. What you do remember from reports is that the name of the foreman of the 5th food depot, a known miser and sadist, is Malakai Drek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从来没听说哪个恶魔叫这个名字，不过你记得之前看过船上的任务报告。五号粮库的领班叫马莱凯·德雷克，是个众所周知的吝啬鬼、虐待狂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}そんなディーモンについて聞いた記憶はない。報告書で覚えているのは、第5食糧庫の監督で、守銭奴でサディストとして知られるマラカイ・ドレックの名前だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not remember hearing of such a daemon before. What you do remember from reports is that the name of the foreman of the 5th food depot, a known miser and sadist, is Malakai Drek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}そんなディーモンについて聞いた記憶はない。報告書で覚えているのは、第5食糧庫の監督で、守銭奴でサディストとして知られるマラカイ・ドレックの名前だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erinnerst dich nicht, je von einem solchen Dämonen gehört zu haben. Woran du dich aber erinnerst, das sind Berichte, dass der Vorarbeiter des 5. Lebensmitteldepots, ein berüchtigter Geizkragen und Sadist, Malakai Drek heißt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not remember hearing of such a daemon before. What you do remember from reports is that the name of the foreman of the 5th food depot, a known miser and sadist, is Malakai Drek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erinnerst dich nicht, je von einem solchen Dämonen gehört zu haben. Woran du dich aber erinnerst, das sind Berichte, dass der Vorarbeiter des 5. Lebensmitteldepots, ein berüchtigter Geizkragen und Sadist, Malakai Drek heißt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu isimde bir iblisi daha önce işittiğini hatırlamıyorsun. Raporlardan hatırladığın ise beşinci gıda deposundaki ustabaşının ismi, pek meşhur bir paragöz ve sadist olan Malakai Drek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not remember hearing of such a daemon before. What you do remember from reports is that the name of the foreman of the 5th food depot, a known miser and sadist, is Malakai Drek.{/n}
